Select * From ( Select * From ( Select idx,customerKey,customerKey1,groupId,groupName,customerId,commentType,comment,commentImage,commentDateTime,orderdate From ( Select T1.idx ,concat('****-',right(trim(T1.customerKey),4)) as customerKey ,Case when T1.commentType='Y' Then ifnull((Select A.profileimage From ofUser A Where A.userId=T1.userId ),'http://www.salesb.co.kr/salesb/images/img_00.png') Else T3.description End customerKey1 ,T1.groupId ,T4.groupName ,T1.customerId ,T1.commentType ,replace(T1.comment,replace('\n',' ',''), replace('
',' ','')) as comment ,T1.commentImage ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.commentDateTime, '%h:%i %p') as commentDateTime ,T1.commentDateTime as orderdate From smCommunity T1 Left Join smCustomer T2 On T1.customerKey = T2.customerKey Left Join ofCode T3 On T2.customerKey1 = T3.codeId And T3.codeGroupId='CU01' Left Join ofGroup T4 On T1.groupId=T4.groupId Where T1.groupId= #{groupId} order by T1.commentDateTime desc LIMIT 0,10 ) As Temp0 union all Select idx,customerKey,customerKey1,groupId,groupName,customerId,commentType,comment,commentImage,commentDateTime,orderdate From ( Select T1.idx ,concat('****-',right(trim(T1.customerKey),4)) as customerKey ,ifnull(T3.description,'http://www.salesb.co.kr/salesb/images/img_00.png') as customerKey1 ,T1.groupId ,T4.groupName ,'' as customerId ,T1.commentType ,replace(T1.comment,replace('\n',' ',''), replace('
',' ','')) as comment ,'' as commentImage ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.commentDateTime, '%h:%i %p') as commentDateTime ,T1.commentDateTime as orderdate ,T1.displayYn From smAutoCommunity T1 Left Join smCustomer T2 On T1.customerKey = T2.customerKey Left Join ofCode T3 On T2.customerKey1 = T3.codeId And T3.codeGroupId='CU01' Left Join ofGroup T4 On T1.groupId=T4.groupId Where T1.groupId= #{groupId} Order by RAND() LIMIT 0,5 ) As Temp Where Temp.displayYn='Y' ) as Temp Order by Temp.orderdate desc LIMIT 0,10 ) as Temp3 Order by Temp3.orderdate asc

Select idx,customerKey,customerKey1,groupId,customerId,commentType,comment,commentDateTime,orderdate,replyCnt From ( Select T1.idx ,concat('****-',right(trim(T1.customerKey),4)) as customerKey ,T3.description as customerKey1 ,T1.groupId ,T1.customerId ,T1.commentType ,replace(T1.comment,replace('\n',' ',''), replace('
',' ','')) as comment ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.commentDateTime, '%h:%i %p') as commentDateTime ,T1.commentDateTime as orderdate ,(Select count(T4.idx) from smCommunity T4 Where T4.upidx=T1.idx ) as replyCnt From smCommunity T1 Left Join smCustomer T2 On T1.customerKey = T2.customerKey Left Join ofCode T3 On T2.customerKey1 = T3.codeId And T3.codeGroupId='CU01' WHERE T1.groupId= #{groupId} AND T1.customerKey = #{customerKey} order by T1.orderdate desc LIMIT 0,10 ) As Temp0

Select idx,groupName,commentType,comment,commentImage,commentDateTime,orderdate From ( Select idx,groupName,commentType,comment,commentImage,commentDateTime,orderdate From ( Select 'N' as commentType, T1.idx ,T2.groupName ,replace(T1.comment,replace('\n',' ',''), replace('
',' ','')) as comment ,T1.commentImage ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.commentDateTime, '%h:%i %p') as commentDateTime ,T1.commentDateTime as orderdate From smCommunity T1 Left Join ofGroup T2 On T1.groupId=T2.groupId WHERE T1.groupId= #{groupId} AND T1.customerKey = #{customerKey} union all Select 'Y' as commentType, T1.upidx as idx, T3.groupName, replace(T1.comment,replace('\n',' ',''), replace('
',' ','')) as comment, T1.commentImage, DATE_FORMAT(T1.commentDateTime, '%h:%i %p') as commentDateTime, T1.commentDateTime as orderdate From smCommunity T1 Left Join smCommunity T2 On T2.idx=T1.upidx Left Join ofGroup T3 On T1.groupId=T3.groupId Where T1.groupId= #{groupId} AND T2.customerKey = #{customerKey} and T1.commentType='Y' ) as Temp0 Order by idx desc LIMIT 0,6 ) as Temp1 Order by idx , orderdate asc

SELECT T1.idx ,T1.customerKey ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.commentDateTime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as commentDateTime ,T1.comment ,T1.userId ,T2.userName FROM smCommunity T1 Left Join ofUser T2 on T1.userId=T2.userId Where T1.upidx = #{upidx} order by commentDateTime desc
